name: Innoquous 1+2+3+4 HD
description:
Flip your way through over 100 stages total across four classic Innoquous games from 2008-2011, remastered to native HD and with a few extra enhancements like improved save files and native speedrun timing in Innoquous 1.

Innoquous
Short ten-level gravity switching platformer – hit an arrow and your gravity will align to match it. Get to the exit but don’t fall off the level!

Innoquous 2
Big gravity-switching platformer action. Once again, hit an arrow and your gravity will be redirected. However, this time, there are hazards that will directly kill you instead of just falling off the level. So Innoquous 2 isn’t very innocuous any more. Maybe this one should have been Noquous…

Innoquous 3
Back, bigger, and brillianter! Innoquous 3 adds a splash of colour, among many new features - a level select, new game modes, new secrets to find, trophies to collect, and much more.

Innoquous 4
The fourth in the series of gravity-flipping platformer games, Innoquous 4 is over four times the size of its predecessor! 75 levels with six distinct game modes adding challenging twists to already challenging levels, not including the added Speedrun mode – complete the entire game as quickly as you can.
